step1.subtitle: Wedding preparations don't have to be stressful. Let's explore together what the WeddMate app can do for you.
step1.title: Say I do to perfect wedding

step2.subtitle: Simply get in touch with the photographer, band or catering company. Search for interesting services in the area and create your own team of suppliers.
step2.title: The best Vendors

step3.subtitle: Create a wedding budget using price estimates and keep your finances under control.
step3.title: Save every penny

step4.subtitle: With us you will never forget anything! Plan your own tasks and get inspired by the pre-made plans.
step4.title: Step by step

step5.subtitle: Send out invitations directly from the app and keep track of who's arriving with whom.
step5.title: Guests and Invites

step6.subtitle: Keep track of your wedding day with timelines.
step6.title: Every minute under control

step7.subtitle:
On your own wedding website you can plan your wedding online and give your guests access to all the important information.
We will create it for you free of charge and immediately.
step7.title: All in one platform
